languages.text: "Подрыв логистических линий, подкуп служителей Адептус Администратум, подделка документов, а также организация еретических бунтов. Кроме очевидно ужасающих экономических последствий для вашего протектората, все это привело к нарушениям поставок Имперской десятины, что в свою очередь привлекло внимание Администратума. Сюда направляется достопочтимый Адептус Арбитес, и до его прибытия нам необходимо разрешить ситуацию, наказав виновных".

traits.locale_text: "Подрыв логистических линий, подкуп служителей Адептус Администратум, подделка документов, а также организация еретических бунтов. Кроме очевидно ужасающих экономических последствий для вашего протектората, все это привело к нарушениям поставок Имперской десятины, что в свою очередь привлекло внимание Министорума. Сюда направляется достопочтимый Адептус Арбитр, и до его прибытия нам необходимо разрешить ситуацию, наказав виновных".

languages.text: "Disruption of logistical lines, bribery of Adeptus Administratum officials, document forgery, and organisation of heretical insurrections. On top of the evidently devastating economic impact this has had on your protectorate, these criminal acts have impeded the delivery of the Imperial Tithe, which, in turn, has drawn the Administratum's attention. An esteemed member of the Adeptus Arbites is expected to arrive on Dargonus shortly, and before they do, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."
languages.original_text: "Подрыв логистических линий, подкуп служителей Адептус Администратум, подделка документов, а также организация еретических бунтов. Кроме очевидно ужасающих экономических последствий для вашего протектората, все это привело к нарушениям поставок Имперской десятины, что в свою очередь привлекло внимание Администратума. Сюда направляется достопочтимый Адептус Арбитес, и до его прибытия нам необходимо разрешить ситуацию, наказав виновных".

An esteemed member of the Adeptus Arbites is expected to arrive on Dargonus shortly, and before they do, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

An esteemed member of the Adeptus Arbites is expected to arrive on Dargonus shortly, and before they do, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

languages.text: « Perturbation des lignes logistiques, corruption d'agents de l'Adeptus Administratum, falsification de documents, organisation d'insurrections hérétiques... Sans même parler de l'impact économique que tous ces crimes ont eu sur votre protectorat, qui est déjà dramatique, ils ont surtout entravé la collecte de la dîme impériale, ce qui a attiré l'attention de l'Administratum. Nous devons donc nous attendre à recevoir sous peu la visite d'un honorable agent de l'Adeptus Arbites. Il est crucial que nous identifiions et châtiions les coupables avant son arrivée. »
languages.original_text: "Disruption of logistical lines, bribery of Adeptus Administratum officials, document forgery, and organisation of heretical insurrections. On top of the evidently devastating economic impact this has had on your protectorate, these criminal acts have impeded the delivery of the Imperial Tithe, which, in turn, has drawn the Administratum's attention. An esteemed member of the Adeptus Arbites is expected to arrive on Dargonus shortly, and before they do, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

traits.locale_text: « Perturbation des lignes logistiques, corruption d'agents de l'Adeptus Administratum, falsification de documents, organisation d'insurrections hérétiques... Sans même parler de l'impact économique que tous ces crimes ont eu sur votre protectorat, qui est déjà dramatique, ils ont surtout entravé la collecte de la dîme impériale, ce qui a attiré l'attention de l'Administratum. Nous devons donc nous attendre à recevoir sous peu la visite d'un honorable agent de l'Adeptus Arbites. Il est crucial que nous identifiions et châtiions les coupables avant son arrivée. »

languages.text: "Störung logistischer Routen, Bestechung von Vertretern des Adeptus Administratum, Fälschung von Dokumenten und Organisation häretischer Aufstände. Neben ihren nachweislich verheerenden Auswirkungen auf Euer Protektorat haben diese Verbrechen die Erhebung des Imperialen Zehnts behindert, was wiederum die Aufmerksamkeit des Administratums geweckt hat. Ein geschätztes Mitglied des Adeptus Arbites wird in Kürze auf Dargonus eintreffen, aber bis dahin sind wir verpflichtet, die Verantwortlichen zu identifizieren und zu bestrafen."
languages.original_text: "Disruption of logistical lines, bribery of Adeptus Administratum officials, document forgery, and organisation of heretical insurrections. On top of the evidently devastating economic impact this has had on your protectorate, these criminal acts have impeded the delivery of the Imperial Tithe, which, in turn, has drawn the Administratum's attention. An esteemed member of the Adeptus Arbites is expected to arrive on Dargonus shortly, and before they do, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

traits.locale_text: "Störung logistischer Routen, Bestechung von Vertretern des Adeptus Administratum, Fälschung von Dokumenten und Organisation häretischer Aufstände. Neben ihren nachweislich verheerenden Auswirkungen auf Euer Protektorat haben diese Verbrechen die Erhebung des Imperialen Zehnts behindert, was wiederum die Aufmerksamkeit des Administratums geweckt hat. Ein geschätztes Mitglied des Adeptus Arbites wird in Kürze auf Dargonus eintreffen, aber bis dahin sind wir verpflichtet, die Verantwortlichen zu identifizieren und zu bestrafen."

languages.text: “扰乱后勤路线、贿赂帝国内政部长官、伪造文件、组织异端叛乱。这些犯罪行为不仅对您的王朝经济造成了破坏性的后果，还对帝国什一税的缴纳工作造成了阻碍，而这已经引起了内政部的注意。德高望重的法务部成员恐怕很快就会抵达达戈努斯。我们有义务在法务部的人到来之前，将相关的责任人揪出来，进行惩处。”
languages.original_text: "Disruption of logistical lines, bribery of Adeptus Administratum officials, document forgery, and organisation of heretical insurrections. On top of the evidently devastating economic impact this has had on your protectorate, these criminal acts have impeded the delivery of the Imperial Tithe, which, in turn, has drawn the Administratum's attention. An esteemed member of the Adeptus Arbites is expected to arrive on Dargonus shortly, and before they do, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

traits.locale_text: “扰乱后勤路线、贿赂帝国内政部长官、伪造文件、组织异端叛乱。这些犯罪行为不仅对您的王朝经济造成了破坏性的后果，还对帝国什一税的缴纳工作造成了阻碍，而这已经引起了内政部的注意。德高望重的法务部成员恐怕很快就会抵达达戈努斯。我们有义务在法务部的人到来之前，将相关的责任人揪出来，进行惩处。”

languages.text: «Disrupción de las cadenas logísticas, soborno de funcionarios del Adeptus Administratum, falsificación de documentos y organización de insurrecciones heréticas. Además del devastador efecto sobre su protectorado, estos actos criminales han afectado a la colecta del Diezmo Imperial, lo que a su vez ha atraído la atención del Administratum. Un estimado miembro del Adeptus Arbites llegará pronto a Dargonus. Para cuando lo haga, es nuestro deber encontrar y castigar a los responsables».
languages.original_text: "Disruption of logistical lines, bribery of Adeptus Administratum officials, document forgery, and organisation of heretical insurrections. On top of the evidently devastating economic impact this has had on your protectorate, these criminal acts have impeded the delivery of the Imperial Tithe, which, in turn, has drawn the Administratum's attention. An esteemed member of the Adeptus Arbites is expected to arrive on Dargonus shortly, and before they do, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

traits.locale_text: «Disrupción de las cadenas logísticas, soborno de funcionarios del Adeptus Administratum, falsificación de documentos y organización de insurrecciones heréticas. Además del devastador efecto sobre su protectorado, estos actos criminales han afectado a la colecta del Diezmo Imperial, lo que a su vez ha atraído la atención del Administratum. Un estimado miembro del Adeptus Arbites llegará pronto a Dargonus. Para cuando lo haga, es nuestro deber encontrar y castigar a los responsables».

languages.text: 「物流網の寸断、帝国行政局への贈収賄、文書偽造、異端反乱の組織化。このような犯罪行為により貴国の保護領に壊滅的な経済的打撃を与えるのみならず、帝国の租税納付にも支障をきたし、行政府に注視されるに至る。高等裁定局の成員が間もなくダルゴナスに到着される予定であり、その前に責任者を特定し処罰せねばならない」
languages.original_text: "Disruption of logistical lines, bribery of Adeptus Administratum officials, document forgery, and organisation of heretical insurrections. On top of the evidently devastating economic impact this has had on your protectorate, these criminal acts have impeded the delivery of the Imperial Tithe, which, in turn, has drawn the Administratum's attention. An esteemed member of the Adeptus Arbites is expected to arrive on Dargonus shortly, and before they do, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

traits.locale_text: 「物流網の寸断、帝国行政局への贈収賄、文書偽造、異端反乱の組織化。このような犯罪行為により貴国の保護領に壊滅的な経済的打撃を与えるのみならず、帝国の租税納付にも支障をきたし、行政府に注視されるに至る。高等裁定局の成員が間もなくダルゴナスに到着される予定であり、その前に責任者を特定し処罰せねばならない」

languages.text: "Lojistik hatlarını aksatmak, Adeptus Administratum mensuplarına rüşvet vermek, din karşıtı isyanlar düzenlemek ve evrakta sahtecilik. Bu durum, protektoranızda yaşanan ekonomik felakete ek olarak İmparatorluk Aşarı'nın tahsilatına da yol açmış ve Administratum'un dikkatini çekmiştir. Adeptus Arbites'in saygın bir üyesi yakında Dargonus'a gelecek. Bu mühlet içinde bahsi geçen suçların müsebbiplerini bulmak ve cezalandırmakla mükellefiz."
languages.original_text: "Disruption of logistical lines, bribery of Adeptus Administratum officials, document forgery, and organisation of heretical insurrections. On top of the evidently devastating economic impact this has had on your protectorate, these criminal acts have impeded the delivery of the Imperial Tithe, which, in turn, has drawn the Administratum's attention. An esteemed member of the Adeptus Arbites is expected to arrive on Dargonus shortly, and before they do, we are obligated to identify and punish those responsible."

Adeptus Arbites'in saygın bir üyesi yakında Dargonus'a gelecek. Bu mühlet içinde bahsi geçen suçların müsebbiplerini bulmak ve cezalandırmakla mükellefiz."
